This is a need -which the NAEB has been seeking to meet for several

Background and Explanation
It was in 1949, at the time of the NA£B*s first Seminar at Ailerion
House, that an awareness began to crystallize in the Association of the con¬
tributions to American education and culture which educational broadcasters,
if welded together into a genuine profession, could make. Until that time the

managers under the name of The Association of College and University
